review: This stick has major issues staying connected to wifi and through some extensive Googling I found out that the issue was with the internal wifi antenna. The solution to this is to tape a 14 inch piece of wire to it and let 11 inches of it hang vertically.  Since doing this I have had zero issues with this device. I used a thin copper wire and electrical tape.  The fire stick is in dire need of a recall and update and Amazon can recognize this.
